A C D E G I R S

A

AjahFilter - Class in com.ajah.servlet
Simple skeleton class that adds some logging and implements extra methods.
AjahFilter() - Constructor for class com.ajah.servlet.AjahFilter
 

C

clearAllCookies(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Static method in class com.ajah.servlet.util.CookieUtils
Clears all cookies by setting Cookie.setMaxAge(int) to 0;
clearSessionAttributes(HttpServletRequest) - Static method in class com.ajah.servlet.util.SessionUtils
This method will look for a session on the request, and if one is found call SessionUtils.clearSessionAttributes(HttpSession).
clearSessionAttributes(HttpSession) - Static method in class com.ajah.servlet.util.SessionUtils
This method will call HttpSession.removeAttribute(String) on each attribute to ensure that they are cleared.
com.ajah.servlet - package com.ajah.servlet
The Ajah Servlet Library serves to provide a place for utilities that are specific to a servlet environment, but not specific to any particular product (Struts, Spring MVC, etc).
com.ajah.servlet.util - package com.ajah.servlet.util
This package is for *Utils classes, which mostly consist of static utility methods.
CookieUtils - Class in com.ajah.servlet.util
Class for utilities that deal with Cookies.
CookieUtils() - Constructor for class com.ajah.servlet.util.CookieUtils
 

D

destroy() - Method in class com.ajah.servlet.AjahFilter
Does nothing except log.
doFilter(ServletRequest, ServletResponse, FilterChain) - Method in class com.ajah.servlet.AjahFilter
Does nothing except log and FilterChain.doFilter(ServletRequest, ServletResponse).
doFilter(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse, FilterChain) - Method in class com.ajah.servlet.AjahFilter
Does nothing except log and FilterChain.doFilter(ServletRequest, ServletResponse).

E

eradicate(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Static method in class com.ajah.servlet.util.SessionUtils
A more explicit heavy-duty version of HttpSession.invalidate().

G

getCookie(HttpServletRequest, String) - Static method in class com.ajah.servlet.util.CookieUtils
Finds a cookie by name and returns it if found.
getCookie(ServletRequest, String) - Static method in class com.ajah.servlet.util.CookieUtils
Alternate signature for getCookie(HttpServletRequest, String).
getIp(ServletRequest) - Static method in class com.ajah.servlet.util.RequestUtils
Returns the IP of the requester.

I

init(FilterConfig) - Method in class com.ajah.servlet.AjahFilter
Does nothing except log.
